00027 #include "system.h"

00032 
00033 #include "syplog.h"
00034 
00035 extern struct logger_def syplogger;
00036 
00037 void update_node_name (void);
00038 
00040 #define abort() verbose_abort(__FILE__, __LINE__)
00041 
00042 #ifdef ENABLE_TRACE
00043 
00045         #define TRACE(format, ...) message (LOG_FUNC, FACILITY_ZFSD,           \
00046                                     "TRACE %s() by %lu at %s:%d: " format "\n",\
00047                                     __func__, (unsigned long) pthread_self (), \
00048                                     __FILE__, __LINE__, ## __VA_ARGS__)
00049 
00051         #define RETURN_INT(RETVAL)                                              \
00052           do {                                                                  \
00053             int32_t _r = (int32_t) (RETVAL);                                    \
00054             TRACE ("return %" PRIi32, _r);                                      \
00055             return _r;                                                          \
00056           } while (0)
00057 
00059         #define RETURN_PTR(RETVAL)                                              \
00060           do {                                                                  \
00061             TRACE ("return %p", (void *) (RETVAL));                             \
00062             return (RETVAL);                                                    \
00063           } while (0)
00064 
00066         #define RETURN_BOOL(RETVAL)                                             \
00067           do {                                                                  \
00068             bool _r = (RETVAL);                                                 \
00069             TRACE ("return %d", _r);                                            \
00070             return _r;                                                          \
00071           } while (0)
00072 
00074         #define RETURN_VOID                                                     \
00075           do {                                                                  \
00076             TRACE ("return");                                                   \
00077             return;                                                             \
00078           } while (0)
00079 
00080 
00081 #else //ENABLE_TRACE not defined
00082 
00083   #define TRACE(...)
00084   #define RETURN_INT(RETVAL) return (RETVAL)
00085   #define RETURN_PTR(RETVAL) return (RETVAL)
00086   #define RETURN_BOOL(RETVAL) return (RETVAL)
00087   #define RETURN_VOID return
00088 
00089 #endif //ENABLE_TRACE
00090

00115                                                 DBusMessage * msg);

00117 #define is_logger_arg(arg)      is_syplog_arg (arg)

00119 #define message(level,facility,format...) do_log(&syplogger,level,facility, ## format)
